thread.section_title: Wurf Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Wurf | www.wurf.com
thread.title: David Olski

author: David Olski
title: David Olski
text:
I purchased your product for my son, a serious crossfitter, who uses a standing desk at work. After a couple of hours, he texted, I'm really feeling this in my calves. At the end of the first day he texted, "my calves are really sore - in a good way". I had to tease him, "so much for being in great shape - crossfitter. :-)"
Also he was the envy of his co-workers, who couldn't wait to try his Wurf board. Those who have, have loved it.
The conclusion - he loves his Wurf board and "will use the heck out of this". Thanks.
